English: I act in the comedy theater.
You play the role of a serial killer called Sofia.
Hungarian: Te egy Sophiának nevezett bérgyilkost alakítasz.

English: She plays the lead in the TV-series.
We play an important role in the movie.
Hungarian: Mi fontos szerepet alakítunk a filmben.

Finnish: Te näyttelette elokuvassa Olavi Virran poikia.
English: You play the sons of Olavi Virta in the movie.
Hungarian: Ti Olavi Virta fiait játsszátok a filmben.

English: They act in the show called Putous.
